Entry.English: Enter an email to receive notifications when it's your turn

link(CONCEPT_LUXURY) can be given to Nations, Tribes, and Families to improve Opinion. They also can be given to Cities to reduce link(YIELD_DISCONTENT). Luxuries are unlocked by constructing Specialists on Improvements. For example, the link(RESOURCE_HONEY) Luxury comes from link(SPECIALIST_GARDENER,1) on link(IMPROVEMENT_GROVE,1).
Are you sure you want to exit? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Are you sure you want to restart? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Subscribe to the Mohawk Games newsletter by submitting your email

This text will appear on the mod.io website as well as on the discord bot's mod update notifications
List of mods required by this mod to work properly. These mods will always load before this mod.
List of mods that are not compatible with this mod.

each in the format: mod_name,modio_id,modfile_id
where mod_name is the only required field. modio_id is the number id for the mod on mod.io. And modfile_id is the specific version file id.
The mod name "{0_modName}" is reserved for internal use only
